text: Allen Payne (born July 7, 1968) is an American actor. He is known for his role as C.J. Payne on Tyler Perry's House of Payne television show. == Other websites == * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:African- American movie actors Category:African-American television actors Category:African-American actors Category:People from Camden, New Jersey Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from New York City
title: Allen Payne
